title: reflect: add Type.ConvertibleTo, Value.Convert
body:
Type.ConvertibleTo and Value.Convert would provide access to Go conversions, similar to
the way that Type.AssignableTo and Value.Set provide access to Go assignments.

// ConvertibleTo returns true if a value of the type is convertible to type u.
ConvertibleTo(u Type) bool

// Convert returns the value v converted to type t.
// If the usual Go conversion rules do not allow conversion
// of the value v to type t, Convert panics.
func (v Value) Convert(t Type) Value {

Sketch in CL 6500065.
